parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.51

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Interaction

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns a list of button names assigned to the given user action. You can find the action names in config class ControllerSchemes or [[:Category:Key_Actions|user action names]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''actionKeysNamesArray''' userAction

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> userAction: [[String]] - Name of the action

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] of [[String|Strings]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> '''actionKeysNamesArray''' [userAction, maxKeys, inputDevicePriority]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> userAction: [[String]] - name of the action

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> maxKeys: [[Number]] - maximum number of keys to return

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> inputDevicePriority: [[String]] - result sorted by inputDevicePriority with values: <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.35.127928</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>y</value></part></template>
* <tt>"Mouse"</tt>
* <tt>"Keyboard"</tt>
* <tt>"Stick"</tt>
* <tt>"Gamepad"</tt>
* <tt>"Tracker"</tt>
* <tt>"Combo"</tt> (mouse and keyboard combinations)
* <template><title>sic</title><part><name index="1"/><value><tt>"Controler"</tt></value></part></template> (any controller other than mouse or keyboard)
Other values are considered as: 
* <tt>"Unsorted"</tt>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Array]] of [[String|Strings]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_actionList = [[actionKeysNamesArray]] "ReloadMagazine";</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_actionList = [[actionKeysNamesArray]] ["ReloadMagazine", 1];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[actionKeys]], [[actionKeysImages]], [[actionKeysNames]], [[actionName]], [[inputAction]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on October 26, 2014 - 11:32 (UTC)</dd>

<dd class="note">
inputDevicePriority 'Controler' is not a spelling mistake in description.
</dd>
